extendedInfo.description: This is a sensor data logging application for Android that will gather measurements from all available sensors while recording video or taking time lapse pictures.Data will be stored on the SD card under the "SmartphoneLoggerData" directory.Source code available here:http://code.google.com/p/cellbots/source/browse/trunk/android/java/dataLogger/

reviews.title: Good idea but...
reviews.comment: Does not work on my HTC EVO with CM7. Front camera shows a green scratchy screen while back shows a black screen.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Would be perfect...
reviews.comment: If video worked. It used to work and was great (could have been back on 2.2). Optimus S, stock 2.3. This is a great app but can\'t give 5* until fixed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: App works great
reviews.comment: I love that Android can be useful in extreme conditions like space and yet I carry it everyday as a regular tool!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Now works on S2! April 2012
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried this on several firmware versions for Samsung Galaxy S2 but the video never worked. Now I\'ve got I\'ve cream sandwich, it works, not perfectly but it records video and sensor data. I can finally record flight data.. so it\'s time to going flying! It doesn\'t close well but that\'s not too much to get around.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: No reviews given!

reviews.title: Dev\'d by NASA
reviews.comment: For the geniuses downranking this, you do realize the app was made for SPHERE and not for CM7 or your Evo, right? Read links!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hardware error
reviews.comment: Following recent updates, one receives camera hardware error. (LG optimus one p500)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty nice but...
reviews.comment: Would be better if you could choose the sensors you want to record (to save space and battery) and run in background (I tried, it crashes). When stopping and starting again timelapse, it crashes as well.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fascinating
reviews.comment: It would appear the sensors in this Android are operating within 2.1701% of normal parameters, sir.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Waste
reviews.comment: Waste of time.....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Phone restarting
reviews.comment: I used it for the first time, and my phone restarted, and it\'s still restarting. I think I will have to pull out my battery now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: not working properly on Galaxy Nexus
reviews.comment: The front facing camera is distorted while the main camera is not working at all...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Scaling broken
reviews.comment: Scaling is broken on my Samsung S3 .. android 4.04
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Verizon\'s Galaxy Nexus (ICS 4.0.2)
reviews.comment: Kind of works on Verizon\'s Galaxy Nexus running ice cream Sandwich 4.0.2...  The back camera doesn\'t work and the front camera has an odd aspect ratio so the image is stretched or squished somehow.   It would be nice to have the barometer sensor data too. Or have the option to have a choice of sensor data to display on screen.  Basically unusable on my phone, but it has great potential!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome! Android on space!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Extremely Useful
reviews.comment: Awesome app - helped me collect data I needed for my senior capstone project.  Only downside is that you cannot record data with the screen off.  Is there a way to bypass that downside?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: Bruns my galaxy s2. Damnit
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: ...but I am curious about how this can be used in the future!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Crashes and burns on galaxy s2, looks great otherwise
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: We live in the future.
reviews.comment: Easy to use and very good at displaying so much information. Responsive and fast.
reviews.author: A Google User
